tr.td: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.Malaria
Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
draft
WHO
computable

div.p: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

tr.td:
Client is not due for malaria vaccination: Client is not due for malaria vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
WHO recommends that the first dose of vaccine be administered from 5 months of age.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for malaria vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first malaria dose as client's age is less than 5 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for malaria vaccination: Client is due for malaria vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for malaria vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first malaria dose as no malaria doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for malaria vaccination: Client is not due for malaria vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
The vaccine should be administered in a 3-dose primary schedule, with a fourth dose provided approximately 12–18 months after the third dose to prolong the duration of protection. There should be a minimum interval of 4 weeks between doses.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for malaria vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for malaria vaccination: Client is due for malaria vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for malaria vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for malaria vaccination: Client is not due for malaria vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for malaria vaccination
Dynamic Values:

intent: (proposal)

Dynamic Values:

payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with fourth malaria dose as the latest malaria dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the fourth dose.)

priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Malaria immunization schedule is complete: Malaria immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Malaria vaccines")"
–
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Malaria immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Malaria immunization schedule is complete. Four malaria primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
